items.name: Eldoret Wonder Circus
items.short_description: Step into a magical world under the big top with thrilling acrobats, funny clowns, and dazzling animal acts, creating unforgettable family memories.
items.address: Uganda Road, next to Moi Teaching and Referral Hospital, Eldoret

items.name: Rift Valley Puppet Guild
items.short_description: Experience enchanting stories brought to life by talented puppeteers, featuring traditional tales and original adventures for all ages.
items.address: Oloo Street, Central Business District, Eldoret

items.name: Safari Circus School & Show
items.short_description: A unique venue offering both captivating circus performances and workshops where kids can learn basic circus skills like juggling and balancing.
items.address: Kimumu Road, Kimumu Estate, Eldoret

items.name: Mwangaza Puppet Adventures
items.short_description: A mobile puppet troupe that regularly performs educational and entertaining shows at community centers and local events across Eldoret.
items.address: Action Estate Community Hall, Eldoret (Main office)

items.name: Eldoret Kids' Discovery Hub
items.short_description: An interactive museum where children learn through play with hands-on exhibits covering science, art, and local culture.
items.address: Elgon View Estate, off Kidiwa Road, Eldoret

items.name: Little Innovators Museum
items.short_description: Inspiring young minds with creative workshops and innovative displays focused on technology, engineering, and problem-solving.
items.address: MTRH Roundabout, Along Uganda Road, Eldoret

items.name: Uasin Gishu Children's Cultural Center
items.short_description: A vibrant center dedicated to introducing children to the rich cultures and traditions of Kenya through storytelling, crafts, and interactive exhibits.
items.address: Off Sosiani River Road, next to Zion Mall, Eldoret

items.name: Tiny Town Learning Museum
items.short_description: A miniature city where children can role-play various professions and learn about community, civics, and everyday life in a fun, immersive environment.
items.address: Off Kisumu Road, West Indies, Eldoret

items.name: Enchanted Rift Valley Gardens
items.short_description: Wander through magical themed gardens, discover whimsical fairy houses, and enjoy charming rides inspired by classic fairy tales.
items.address: Outskirts of Eldoret, along Kapsabet Road

items.name: Storybook Forest Park
items.short_description: Explore a whimsical forest trail dotted with character statues and interactive story scenes from beloved children's books.
items.address: Kapsoya Estate, near Eldoret Airstrip, Eldoret

items.name: Princess & Knight Kingdom
items.short_description: A themed playground and event space where children can dress up, meet royal characters, and participate in knightly quests and princess parties.
items.address: Along Iten Road, Near Annex, Eldoret

items.name: Whispering Woods Fairy Trail
items.short_description: A charming walking trail through a serene forest, featuring tiny fairy doors, hidden gnomes, and magical natural sculptures.
items.address: Kaptagat Forest Edge, Eldoret North

items.name: Jurassic Eldoret Adventure
items.short_description: Roam among life-sized dinosaur replicas, some even animatronic, and dig for fossils in this exciting prehistoric park.
items.address: Off Uganda Road, near Chepkoilel University, Eldoret

items.name: Prehistoric Playground Park
items.short_description: A dinosaur-themed playground with climbing structures, slides, and educational panels about different dinosaur species.
items.address: Off Kisumu Road, Langas Area, Eldoret

items.name: Dino Valley Exploration Center
items.short_description: An indoor and outdoor center offering dinosaur exhibits, paleontological digs, and interactive displays on ancient Earth.
items.address: Along Kapsabet Road, Annex, Eldoret

items.name: Raptor Ridge Discovery
items.short_description: Focusing on predatory dinosaurs, this park offers thrilling themed trails, scavenger hunts, and educational shows about raptors.
items.address: Outskirts of Eldoret, near Plateau

items.name: Eldoret Cosmos Dome
items.short_description: Journey through the stars and galaxies in a state-of-the-art digital dome, offering immersive shows tailored for young astronomers.
items.address: University of Eldoret Grounds, Chepkoilel, Eldoret

items.name: Little Astronauts Star Lab
items.short_description: An interactive center featuring hands-on exhibits about space travel, planets, and constellations, perfect for budding astronauts.
items.address: Pioneer Estate, off Kapsabet Road, Eldoret

items.name: Rift Valley Space Explorers
items.short_description: Combining a small planetarium dome with engaging space-themed games and learning stations about the solar system.
items.address: MTRH Roundabout, next to Zion Mall, Eldoret

items.name: Stellar Journey Planetarium
items.short_description: Offers dazzling visual experiences of the cosmos and guided tours of the night sky, making complex astronomical concepts accessible to children.
items.address: Kapsoya Shopping Centre, Eldoret

items.name: Eldoret Young Scientists Lab
items.short_description: A dynamic science center where children can conduct experiments, explore scientific principles, and unleash their inner scientist.
items.address: Next to Eldoret National Polytechnic, Kapsabet Road, Eldoret

items.name: Innovation Station for Kids
items.short_description: Featuring interactive exhibits on physics, chemistry, and biology, designed to spark curiosity and foster a love for discovery.
items.address: Uganda Road, Opp. Eldoret Sports Club, Eldoret

items.name: Curiosity Corner Science Explorers
items.short_description: A fun and educational space with rotating themed exhibits, science demonstrations, and creative challenges for young learners.
items.address: Elgon View Estate, next to Golf Club, Eldoret

items.name: Tech Kids Discovery Hub
items.short_description: Focusing on modern technology, this center introduces kids to coding, robotics, and digital design through interactive workstations.
items.address: Annex Centre, Iten Road, Eldoret

items.name: Eldoret Safari Quest Park
items.short_description: An outdoor adventure park featuring ziplines, obstacle courses, and themed challenges designed to test agility and teamwork.
items.address: Along Uganda Road, near Rivatex, Eldoret

items.name: Rift Valley Escape Room for Kids
items.short_description: Family-friendly escape rooms with engaging puzzles and mysteries, designed for children to solve with their parents or friends.
items.address: Zion Mall, Uganda Road, Eldoret

items.name: Mystery Manor Kids Challenge
items.short_description: A self-guided quest game set in a playful 'haunted' house, where children solve clues to uncover a hidden treasure.
items.address: Off Kisumu Road, West Indies, Eldoret

items.name: Jungle Jumpers Obstacle Course
items.short_description: An exciting outdoor course filled with nets, tunnels, balance beams, and climbing walls for kids to test their physical skills.
items.address: Along Kapsabet Road, near Eldoret Club, Eldoret

items.name: Green Acres Children's Farm
items.short_description: A working farm where children can interact with various farm animals, learn about crops, and enjoy tractor rides.
items.address: Outskirts of Eldoret, along Iten Road

items.name: Happy Hooves Petting Zoo & Farm
items.short_description: Offers hands-on experiences with friendly farm animals, from feeding goats to petting rabbits, alongside educational farm tours.
items.address: Kapsoya Estate, near Eldoret Bypass, Eldoret

items.name: Maize Maze & Farm Fun
items.short_description: Challenge yourself in a seasonal maize maze, then enjoy various farm-themed games, bouncy castles, and a picnic area.
items.address: Near University of Eldoret, Chepkoilel, Eldoret

items.name: Sunrise Farm Discovery
items.short_description: A family-friendly farm where kids can participate in daily chores, collect eggs, and learn about sustainable farming practices.
items.address: Langas Road, Huruma, Eldoret

items.name: Eldoret Wildlife Sanctuary for Kids
items.short_description: A sanctuary focused on local Kenyan wildlife, providing educational encounters and promoting conservation awareness for young visitors.
items.address: Along Uganda Road, near Moi's Bridge turn-off, Eldoret

items.name: Miniature Savannah Zoo
items.short_description: A compact zoo featuring smaller African animals and birds, designed for easy navigation by families with young children.
items.address: Off Kisumu Road, near National Bank Training School, Eldoret

items.name: Tropical Bird & Reptile House
items.short_description: Discover a vibrant collection of exotic birds and fascinating reptiles in climate-controlled exhibits, perfect for curious minds.
items.address: Elgon View Estate, next to the Arboretum, Eldoret

items.name: Kids' Critter Corner
items.short_description: A dedicated petting zoo and small animal enclosure where children can safely interact with gentle domestic and small exotic animals.
items.address: Pioneer Estate, along Kapsabet Road, Eldoret

items.name: Eldoret Brick Masters Kingdom
items.short_description: An indoor wonderland filled with millions of LEGO bricks, offering free play zones, building challenges, and impressive brick creations.
items.address: Zion Mall, Ground Floor, Uganda Road, Eldoret

items.name: Creative Builders Workshop
items.short_description: A dynamic space equipped with various construction materials, from giant foam blocks to intricate K'nex, encouraging imaginative engineering.
items.address: Kapsoya Shopping Centre, 1st Floor, Eldoret

items.name: Mini City Construction Zone
items.short_description: An outdoor park where kids can operate mini-diggers, cranes, and dump trucks in a supervised sandpit, building their own miniature city.
items.address: Off Kisumu Road, West Indies, Eldoret

items.name: Blocktopia Play Park
items.short_description: A vibrant indoor park featuring giant soft blocks, building stations with various brick types, and a dedicated toddlers' block area.
items.address: Along Iten Road, Near Annex Centre, Eldoret
